section.heading: Temporary license, registration, or certification.
section.text: A board may issue a temporary license, registration, or certification to an applicant for a fixed period of time, under conditions prescribed by the Mayor through rulemaking, who is licensed, registered, or certified and in good standing to practice in another jurisdiction.

annotations.annotation: as added July 18, 2009, D.C. Law 18-26, § 2(e)(9), 56 DCR 4043
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(e)(9) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).
